english.segment1: God be merciful to me on Thy grace, I rest my plea. Plenteous in compassion Thou. Blot out my transgressions now
english.segment2: Wash me, make me pure within. Cleanse, oh, cleanse me from my sin
english.segment3: My transgressions I confess. Grief and guilt my soul oppress. I have sinned against Thy grace. And provoked Thee to Thy face
english.segment4: I confess Thy judgment just. Speechless, I, Thy mercy trust
english.segment5: I am evil born in sin. Thou desirest truth within. Thou alone my Savior art. Teach Thy wisdom to my heart
english.segment6: Make me pure, Thy grace bestow. Wash me whiter than the snow
english.segment7: Gracious God, my heart renew. Make my spirit right and true. Thy salvation's joy impart. Steadfast make my willing heart. Steadfast make my willing heart
english.segment8: Broken, humbled to the dust. By Thy wrath and judgment just. Let my contrite heart rejoice. And in gladness hear Thy voice
english.segment9: From my sins, oh, hide Thy face. Blot them out in boundless grace
